thread.title: Trump says will meet with Putin 'in the not too distant future'

title: Trump says will meet with Putin 'in the not too distant future'
text:
Trump says will meet with Putin 'in the not too distant future' 5:11pm EDT - 01:12 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he called Russia President Vladimir Putin to congratulate him on his election victory and suggested the two leaders would meet shortly. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he called Russia President Vladimir Putin to congratulate him on his election victory and suggested the two leaders would meet shortly.
